attributes.action: Taxpayer funding cancelled for renovation of Buckingham Palace.
attributes.additional_details:
'Buckingham Palace to get £369m refurbishment'
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-38025513

'£370m repair work to ensure Buckingham Palace is 'fit for purpose'

Read more: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/wires/pa/article-3949590/Buckingham-Palace-370m-facelift.html#ixzz4QOcNRQha 
Follow us: @MailOnline on Twitter | DailyMail on Facebook
attributes.background:
The treasury has just announced £369m of funding over the next ten years towards renovations of Buckingham Palace. At a time of still-growing social and economic inequality, the idea of 'investing' in privilege pours scorn on the struggles of ordinary British people.
Reduce the funding.
